subsection.name: Purpose
subsection.p: In order to enhance the community and the diffusion of Papyrus, new features and enhancements should be documented through a small video uploaded to youtube channel.

subsection.name: Pre-requis
subsection.p: Download the free version of Active presenter: http://atomisystems.com/activepresenter/

subsection.name: Processus
subsection.p: Edit the project properties: Add the description and the name of the project
Upload the video to youtube: make it with a committer to access the password/login
Diffuse it: mail to the mailing list and post a tweet on the papyrus twetter account
